titleStmt.title: Natural history of the passions
titleStmt.author: Charleton, Walter, 1619-1707.
Senault, Jean-François, 1601-1672. De l'usage des passions.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for James Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Based on: De l'usage des passions / by J.F. Senault.
Written by Walter Charleton. Cf. BM.
Wing erroneously attributed this work to J.F. Senault.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
